topRisks: Dependency on third-party providers for SMS functionality.
Potential gap in volunteer segmentation by location.
Verification required for WCAG contrast accessibility standards.
Limited documentation on platform-wide error handling.
nextActions: Identify and integrate a third-party SMS provider.
Confirm if volunteer profiles can include location data for segmentation.
Perform a contrast audit of the web interface.
Request comprehensive error handling and user guidance documentation.
proofNotes: All 15 Capability Brief statements were mapped to RFP requirements.
Four requirements were marked as Partial due to missing details on SMS, location segmentation, contrast, and general guidance.
Proof verifier checks evidenceQuotes against the Capability Brief text (normalized matching; ellipsis wildcard supported).
The "Evidence mismatch" flag is verifier-owned and is only added/removed by the proof verifier.
Proof totals count unpaired evidence IDs (IDs without quotes) as unverified references (conservative scoring).

requirements.text: The system shall support volunteer registration with configurable form fields.
requirements.responseSummary: ReliefRoster supports web-based registration with fully configurable form fields and validation.
evidenceQuotes: ReliefRoster provides web-based volunteer registration with configurable form fields.

requirements.text: The system shall allow coordinators to create events and define shifts with capacity limits.
requirements.responseSummary: Coordinators have full control over event creation and shift capacity management.
evidenceQuotes: Coordinators can create events and define shifts with capacity limits.

requirements.text: The system shall allow volunteers to sign up for shifts and receive confirmations.
requirements.responseSummary: The platform enables volunteer self-signup and provides automated confirmation emails.
evidenceQuotes: CB-02 Coordinators can create events and define shifts with capacity limits; volunteers can self-signup for available shifts.
CB-03 Automated email confirmations and reminders are supported with configurable schedules (e.g., 24h, 2h).

requirements.text: The system shall send automated reminders 24 hours and 2 hours before a shift via email.
requirements.responseSummary: Automated email reminders are sent based on a configurable schedule, including 24-hour and 2-hour intervals.
evidenceQuotes: Automated email... reminders are supported with configurable schedules (e.g., 24h, 2h).

requirements.text: The system shall support optional SMS reminders (if enabled by the organization).
requirements.responseSummary: SMS reminders are supported through integration with a third-party provider.
evidenceQuotes: SMS reminders are not included by default; integration is possible via a third-party SMS provider.

requirements.text: The system shall allow coordinators to mark attendance and record no-shows.
requirements.responseSummary: The system includes comprehensive attendance tracking and the ability to record no-shows.
evidenceQuotes: Attendance tracking is supported... including notes and no-show marking.

requirements.text: The system shall maintain a volunteer profile including languages, skills, certifications, and availability.
requirements.responseSummary: Volunteer profiles capture essential data including skills, languages, and certifications.
evidenceQuotes: Volunteer profiles support skills, language preference, certifications, and availability notes.

requirements.text: The system shall support role-based access (Admin, Coordinator, Volunteer).
requirements.responseSummary: The solution provides distinct access levels for Admins, Coordinators, and Volunteers.
evidenceQuotes: Role-based access is supported with Admin, Coordinator, and Volunteer roles.

requirements.text: The system shall provide a bilingual messaging option (English/Spanish) for templates.
requirements.responseSummary: Messaging templates support both English and Spanish for all volunteer communications.
evidenceQuotes: Messaging templates can be authored in English and Spanish.

requirements.text: The system shall provide a dashboard showing volunteer counts, shift fill rates, and attendance metrics.
requirements.responseSummary: A real-time dashboard provides key metrics on registration, shift fill rates, and attendance.
evidenceQuotes: Dashboards include volunteer counts, fill rates, attendance rate, and volunteer hours by event.

requirements.text: The system shall support CSV export of volunteer rosters, schedules, and attendance logs.
requirements.responseSummary: All critical data including rosters and attendance logs can be exported via CSV.
evidenceQuotes: CSV export is supported for rosters, schedules, and attendance logs.

requirements.text: The system shall allow coordinators to broadcast announcements to selected volunteer segments (by skill/language/location).
requirements.responseSummary: Coordinators can target announcements to specific volunteer segments based on skills and language.
evidenceQuotes: Coordinators can broadcast announcements to volunteer segments (by skill and language preference).
gapsOrQuestions: Confirm if volunteer profiles can include location data for segmentation.

requirements.text: The system shall provide a basic audit log of coordinator actions.
requirements.responseSummary: The system maintains an audit log of all key coordinator actions for accountability.
evidenceQuotes: Coordinator actions are recorded in an audit log.

requirements.text: The system shall support data retention settings for inactive volunteer records.
requirements.responseSummary: Organizations can define custom data retention rules for inactive volunteer records.
evidenceQuotes: Data retention rules can be configured for inactive volunteers.

requirements.text: The system shall provide accessibility considerations for web UI (keyboard navigation and readable contrast).
requirements.responseSummary: The web UI supports keyboard navigation for essential workflows.
evidenceQuotes: UI... includes keyboard navigation for key workflows.
gapsOrQuestions: Verify if the web UI meets specific readable contrast ratio standards.

requirements.text: The platform shall be accessible via modern browsers on desktop and mobile.
requirements.responseSummary: The platform is fully accessible via modern desktop and mobile browsers.
evidenceQuotes: UI supports mobile browsers.

requirements.text: The platform shall support at least 2,000 registered volunteers.
requirements.responseSummary: The system is designed to support up to 5,000 volunteers, exceeding the 2,000 requirement.
evidenceQuotes: ReliefRoster is designed for organizations up to ~5,000 volunteers.

requirements.text: The platform shall provide basic error handling and clear user guidance.
requirements.responseSummary: The platform includes form validation to guide users during registration.
evidenceQuotes: configurable form fields and required/optional validation.
gapsOrQuestions: Request detailed documentation on platform-wide error handling and user guidance.

requirements.text: The platform shall ensure that exported data can be downloaded without additional tools.
requirements.responseSummary: Data exports are provided in standard CSV format, requiring no additional tools.
evidenceQuotes: CSV export is supported.

proposalOutline.executiveSummary: ReliefRoster offers a comprehensive volunteer management solution tailored for disaster relief, ensuring rapid onboarding and reliable coordination through automated tools and bilingual support.
evidenceVerificationNotes: All proposed capabilities are directly supported by the ReliefRoster Capability Brief.
